moduleDescription:
Functionality that can be used in the implementation of text-mode applications
used on the console or command line.

entities.name: ConsoleApplicationUtil
entities.description: Common utility functions for command line applications.

entities.name: Stdin
entities.description: Implementation of the standard input stream.

entities.name: ArgumentVector
entities.description:
Provides a convenient utility for interpreting and parsing command line
argument arrays and vectors.

entities.name: ConsoleApplicationMain
entities.description: A common base class for command line applications.

entities.name: Stdout
entities.description: Implementation of the standard output stream.

entities.name: Terminal
entities.description:
Represents the text mode terminal and provides functionality for raw input
and customized drawing features.

entities.name: UsageInfo
entities.description:
A utility class for constructing usage instructions for end-users of
command-line applications.

entities.name: ConsoleApplicationContext
entities.description:
An implementation of ApplicationContext that represents a command line
application intended to be used on a text mode terminal.

entities.name: CommandLineArgument
entities.description:
Represents a single comment line argument and provides convenience methods
for accessing its value.
